title: Chatbot Development with Dialogflow
description: Create a conversational chatbot using Dialogflow
details: This project involves building a highly interactive chatbot capable of understanding and responding to user queries. The chatbot will be integrated with a web platform and will utilize NLP capabilities.

title: Serverless Architecture with AWS Lambda
description: Build a serverless application using AWS Lambda
details: Develop a scalable serverless architecture using AWS services. This project focuses on creating microservices that respond to API requests without the need for server management.

title: Automated Testing with Selenium
description: Implement automated testing scripts using Selenium
details: Create a suite of automated tests for web applications using Selenium. The project aims to enhance the QA process by reducing manual testing efforts and ensuring consistent test execution.

title: GraphQL API Development
description: Develop a GraphQL API for data querying
details: Build a robust GraphQL API to enable efficient data querying and manipulation. This API will serve as a flexible and powerful interface for interacting with the application's data layer.

title: Real-time Analytics Dashboard
description: Build a real-time analytics dashboard using WebSockets
details: Develop an interactive dashboard that visualizes data in real-time using WebSockets. The dashboard will provide insights into key performance metrics, updating dynamically as new data arrives.

title: Content Management System with Laravel
description: Develop a CMS using Laravel for content management
details: Create a user-friendly content management system (CMS) with Laravel, allowing users to easily manage and publish digital content. This project focuses on developing a secure, scalable, and intuitive platform.

title: API Rate Limiting Solution
description: Implement rate limiting for APIs to prevent abuse
details: Design and implement an API rate limiting solution using Redis and Node.js to protect APIs from overuse and abuse. This project aims to enhance security and ensure fair usage of API resources.

title: Interactive Map with Leaflet.js
description: Create an interactive map application using Leaflet.js
details: Develop an interactive map application using Leaflet.js, enabling users to explore geographical data with dynamic and responsive features. The project involves integrating various mapping services and data layers.
